ygData.subject: Re: Bards and Everquest books.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Sky Guild was founded in 1985 on Compuserve in the game Island of Kesmai.  It has been in continuous operation, making forays in Drakkar, etc. Until
ygData.messageBody:
> I am an officer in the largest and arguably
> oldest online gaming guild (The Syndicate www.thesyndicate.org )

The Sky Guild was founded in 1985 on Compuserve in the game Island of
Kesmai. It has been in continuous operation, making forays in Drakkar, etc.
Until recently it was primarily based on Legends of Kesmai on Gamestorm. It
is known as "the Ancient Mystery of Sky" in EQ on Povar.

Most people don't "get" the meaning of the name...in medieval times a trade
guild was called a Mystery...guess the meaning of the word changed over
time. <g>

Paralto of Povar

http://www.ccs-net.com/Sky/
